taxon.author: (Simon, 1887)
taxon.distribution: Temperate Asia. Introduced to both Americas, Belgium, Germany, Africa, India, Sri Lanka, Southeast Asia, Australia, Pacific Is.

referenceObject.reference: Simon, E. (1887e). Arachnides recueillis à Obock en 1886, par M. le Dr L. Faurot. Bulletin de la Société Zoologique de France 12: 452-455.
